items.sentence: Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t planning on going camping with us.
Tom knew that he couldn\'t do what Mary was asking him to do.
Speaking only in French all day was a good experience for me.
The age difference between Tom and Mary is about three years.
Tom realized he was probably not going to be able to do that.
I don\'t suppose you want to just tell me who you really are?
Tom advised Mary to take some time to think over her options.
Tom was mad at me because I wouldn\'t go out with his sister.
We\'ve been practicing for the competition for several weeks.
I wanted to tell you where I\'d been, but Tom told me not to.
